author: Simon Difford
description: Rum takes over from Scotch as base spirit in this Nail but Islay single malt adds interest and keeps it a true Nail (being any drink with Drambuie and Scotch whisky).
name: Tapered Nail
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
